changelog:
v1.2.4 - Accuracy & Refinement

• New: Review Mode - Post-scan UI to verify and correct sorting accuracy.
• New: Category Wizard - Propose and apply keyword improvements based on your review decisions.
• New: Add custom categories on the fly during review.
• Improved: Hierarchical folders (Drums/Hats/Open, Melodics/Synths).
• Fixed: UI alignment and spacebar audio preview issues.
• Fixed: SSL certificate validation for update checker.
